mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_EXCH_RATE_HIST ( rhist_currency, rhist_cur_name, rhist_base_rate, rhist_bkpr_rate, rhist_tt_buy_rate, rhist_tt_sell_rate, rhist_smbs_base_rate, rhist_smbs_bkpr_rate, rhist_reg_dt, rhist_announce_no ) VALUES ( #{rhistCurrency}, #{rhistCurName}, #{rhistBaseRate}, #{rhistBkprRate}, #{rhistTtBuyRate}, #{rhistTtSellRate}, #{rhistSmbsBaseRate}, #{rhistSmbsBkprRate}, #{rhistRegDt}, #{rhistAnnounceNo} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT t.*, ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( PARTITION BY rhist_currency ORDER BY rhist_reg_dt DESC ) rn FROM TB_EXCH_RATE_HIST t ) WHERE rn = 1 ORDER BY rhist_currency
SELECT * FROM TB_EXCH_RATE_HIST WHERE rhist_currency = #{currency} ORDER BY rhist_reg_dt DESC

SELECT curr.rhist_currency AS rhistCurrency, curr.rhist_cur_name AS rhistCurName, curr.rhist_base_rate AS rhistBaseRate,
NVL(curr.rhist_base_rate - prev.rhist_base_rate, 0) AS change,
CASE WHEN prev.rhist_base_rate IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE ROUND( (curr.rhist_base_rate - prev.rhist_base_rate) / prev.rhist_base_rate * 100, 2 ) END AS changePercent
FROM TB_EXCH_RATE_HIST curr LEFT JOIN TB_EXCH_RATE_HIST prev ON curr.rhist_currency = prev.rhist_currency AND prev.rhist_reg_dt = ( SELECT MAX(rhist_reg_dt) FROM TB_EXCH_RATE_HIST WHERE rhist_currency = curr.rhist_currency AND rhist_reg_dt < curr.rhist_reg_dt )
WHERE curr.rhist_reg_dt = ( SELECT MAX(rhist_reg_dt) FROM TB_EXCH_RATE_HIST WHERE rhist_currency = curr.rhist_currency )
ORDER BY curr.rhist_currency
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT t.*, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY t.rhist_reg_dt DESC) AS rn FROM TB_EXCH_RATE_HIST t WHERE t.rhist_currency = #{currency} ) WHERE rn = 1
